Hello, I’m Caue Moyano, a Web Developer and UX/UI Designer based in the UK.

PROJECTS

Projects

RESA Electronics

An e-commerce website focused on selling second-hand electronic devices. It's a fictional company intented to make people aware of the importance of reusing and recycling trough the selling of high-quality used products.

LIVE VIEW CODE

Football Score

A web app that provides the latest results and scheduled football matches of the major european leagues. Also, basic information about teams and leagues can be accessed. The data is provided from an external API: https://www.football-data.org/.

LIVE VIEW CODE

Maple Bear Adventures

It is a website for a fictional adventure agency which offers outdoor activities. The website provides interactivity to display the possibilities at the first glance.
